Lists (an ongoing attempt to collect my thoughts.)

—

What matters to me:

  • giving my kids a good life
  • figuring out what that means
  • figuring out what a good life means for me and Amy when they're gone
  • making enough money to provide for my family and our artistic ventures
  • friendship with my wife
  • feeling as if my actions both individual and as a whole have meaning
  • enjoying and create art
  • exploring what it means to have a good house/home
  • to learn from intelligent and authentic people and artists
  • enabling my mom to have a better life
  • overcoming my pain surrounding my father
  • focusing and having full thoughts
  • resolving the tension I have between the city and the country
  • traveling often
  • preparing for the future without being a slave to it
  • relaxing well and often
